enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Students need to have taken at least one of EECS 337-0, EECS 338-0, EECS 348-0, or EECS 344-0 in order to register for this course. Recommended: EECS 330-0.
title: MEAS EECS 395-0-73 Special Topics in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science
